dc_title_s: Plan of the city intended for the permanent seat of the government of t[he] United States projected agreeable to the direction of the President of the United States, in pursuance of an act of Congress passed the sixteenth day of July, MDCCXC, "establishing the permanent seat on the bank of the Potowmac"; by Peter Charles L'Enfant.
dc_description_s: Includes text, statistical data, and index to points of interest. 1 map: col.; on sheet 75 x 120 cm
